title: Virtual Assistant (VA)
job_overview:
We’re hiring a reliable, detail-oriented virtual assistant (VA) to complete a simple but important task on a daily basis. No prior experience is required — just consistency, focus, and basic computer skills.

You’ll be responsible for submitting a pre-written inquiry message into contact forms on business websites that we provide. This task goes quickly once you get the hang of it.

Daily Workflow (Monday–Friday):
1. Click the website link from the provided Google Sheet.
2. Search the page (use Ctrl+F) to find the “Contact” or inquiry form.
3. Fill out the form with a provided script (Name, Email, Phone, and Message).
4. Take a screenshot of the completed form before submitting.
5. Mark as complete on the accountability sheet and upload the screenshot.

Daily Quota:
125 submissions per weekday (Monday to Friday)
Must be completed during U.S. business hours (any time between 8am–6pm EST preferred)

Requirements:
• Fast and reliable internet connection
• Basic English typing and reading skills
• Access to Google Sheets and Google Drive
• Ability to follow simple instructions precisely
• Trustworthy, consistent, and detail-oriented
• Able to work independently without constant supervision

Bonus Points If You Have:
• Prior experience as a VA or with repetitive online tasks
• Familiarity with contact forms and online lead generation

Start Date: ASAP
To Apply:
Send a message with:
1. Your name and location
2. Your availability (time of day in your local timezone)
3. One reason you think you’d be a great fit for this role
4. If you're very interested, comment "DylanBlake" somewhere in your message. 
5. Subject line: “I’m Detail-Oriented and Reliable”
